price: Hanyuma mfata ba bandi bahakanye (ndabahana). Mbega uko ibihano byanjye byari bikaze!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
